experience.description: Zarah practices intellectual property law with a focus on Trademarks, Copyrights and Designs. She graduated from ILS Law College, Pune and thereafter joined Selvam and Selvam in 2016. Zarah has developed extensive experience in advising clients on strategies to develop, protect and enforce their trademark rights as well as registering and enforcing copyrights. She has effectively provided legal advice in all aspects of intellectual property to an array of client√®le ranging from start-ups to multi-national corporations alike.During her tenure at the firm, Zarah has worked in depth on various sectors of intellectual property namely trademarks, copyrights, designs and domain disputes including but not limited to prosecution, enforcement and IP transactions such as licensing and transfers of Copyrights, Designs, Trademarks and Domains. She has also represented various clients on opposition and cancellation/revocation proceedings before the Trademark Office and the Intellectual Property Appellate Board.Zarah is often appreciated by her clients for being proactive in protecting their rights, providing regular reviews of their portfolios and for providing practical business advice adding value to their businesses. She has successfully represented a broad range of clients in a variety of industries including FMCG, pharmaceuticals, sports, technology, media and on-line businesses.
